dct_description_sm: "Atlas universel no. 14." World map showing direction of wind currents, based upon the work of the American hygrographer Lt. Matthew Fontaine Maury. Inset: Diagramme des vents et profil de l'atmosphere. E. Andriveau-Goujon was located at rue du Bac 4 from 1876. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: Paris : Publié par E. Andriveau-Goujon, éditeur, rue du Bac, no. 4, [187-?]
